script.dialog: |wave|Little Robot.
I've met so many new monsters!
They've given me gifts that I've never seen before.
It appears that this Zaraden has been |C3|fulfilling her dreams.|C0|
Yeah! I guess so.
I've never really had friends like all of you before.
Except...
Uhh, nevermind.
This Unit now requires several backup storage devices for all the love this Zaraden has shown her.
|wave|You're welcome.
As This Unit has stated before, the dreams of this Zaraden are very powerful.
|C3|Suggestion:|C0| Continue to affect the world by |C3|fulfilling your dreams.|C0|
That's     a strange way to put it.
That was not a metaphorical statement.
What?
|C3|Question:|C0| Has this Zaraden noticed all of the new monsters and gifts that have appeared?
Many of these are new to This Unit.
So we've never seen them?|!||L|Not even when I couldn't remember anything?
That is correct.
Whether conscious or not, the heart of this Zaraden has a |C3|list of dreams|C0| that she wishes to fulfill.
|C3|Fulfilling dreams|C0| is attracting new monsters and changing the behaviors of others.
How is that even possible?
This Unit does not have any explanation for this phenomenon.
It is possible that |C3|fulfilling dreams|C0| can lead to a solution for the endless rain.
So, I'll just do whatever my heart desires?
Sounds like a great plan to me!
All of the monsters have their own |C3|dreams to fulfill|C0| as well.
Monsters that this Zaraden has loved before will have shared their dreams with you.
|wave|I can help them with their dreams too.
These icons will appear next to monsters that have any |C3|unfulfilled dreams.|C0|
|C3|Suggestion:|C0| Use the |C3|Check Heart|C0| option to view the |C3|Dream List.|C0|
You can check the dreams of each monster before you battle them.
Simply knowing their dreams is a vital step to fulfilling them.
Can you guess what my dream is right now?
Looking at the trends in past data, it is almost certainly to interrupt This Unit with-
|wave|I love you.
This Unit dreams of an infinite storage device.
